name: Caravansary
description: Sell one up to 5 units of one type of Resource for mid price. Get the Gold immediately

name: Brewery
story: “A mead in the hand, is worth two goblin heads in a bush”

name: Quarry
story: “We can choose to throw stones, to stumble on them, to climb over them, or to build with them”

name: Runesmithy
story: “Do you want to perform a miracle? Forgive yourself.”

name: Smelter
story: “Leave iron to rest before you hammer it”

name: Workshop
story: “The Humans have a saying. The nail that sticks out gets hammered. We have a saying too. Shoddy work! Not a single nail should be sticking out.”

name: Storage
description: Assign a DwarfMeepleBlue, pay 2 Stone and you can store up to 4 units of a single Resource here as long as the dwarf is in the slot. Resource hidden this way cannot be bought by other players.
story: “The best place to hide something precious is in your beard”
